## Remarks

Be aware that `currentTarget` will be `null`<!-- -->. See: [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Event/currentTarget](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Event/currentTarget)
